gamesList.title: PUBG GLOBAL
gamesList.deskripsi: Game. PUBG KOREA is a player versus player shooter game in which up to a hundred players fight in a battle royale, a type of large-scale last-man-standing death match in which players fight to remain the last one alive. Players can choose to enter matches solo, duo, or with a small team of up to four people.
